name: B. Kevin and Permutation
statement:
For his birthday, Kevin received the set of pairwise distinct numbers 1,
2, 3,
ldots, n as a gift.He is going to arrange these numbers in a way such
that the minimum absolute difference between two consecutive numbers be
maximum possible. More formally, if he arranges numbers in order p_1,
p_2,
ldots, p_n, he wants to maximize the value
min
limits_{i=1}^{n - 1}
lvert p_{i + 1} - p_i
rvert, where |x| denotes the absolute value of x.Help Kevin to do that.
